sentence: Philly Inquirer’s Jonathan Tamari breaks down the numbers: MEHMET OZ has “booked nearly $5 million of ad time” since Nov. 30, DAVID MCCORMICK has spent $3 million on ads since late December, CARLA SANDS has dropped around $2 million since October and a PAC backing JEFF BARTOS has a $2 million ad buy starting next week.
title: POLITICO Playbook: Civil rights leaders fume after meeting with Sinema

sentence: But Sean Hannity is urging him to back celebrity doctor Mehmet Oz.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Trump Reportedly Weighing Double Endorsements in Tight Senate Races: ‘I Get Two Chances to Win’

author: SAM METZ and MEAD GRUVER
title: GOP now looks to censure Cheney and Kinzinger, not oust them
